titles.title: To rename Huntington Lake, Indiana, the "J. Edward Roush Lake".

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2382)
Referred to the House Committee on Public Works + Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Public Works + Transportation

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Renames Huntington Lake, located on the Wabash River in Huntington and Wells Counties, Indiana, as the J. Edward Roush Lake.
